title: The Squire's Bride
description: This delightful retelling of a Norwegian folktale becomes more humorous with every page as a rich, lonely squire tries to take a bride. The squire's choice is a lovely young girl, but the girl has another idea, which sets off a series of laugh-out-loud events. The Squire's Bride is a simple chapter book with charming illustrations.
meta: bay, clatter, courting, debt, harvest, mare, parson, squire
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand fictional text

Double Letters : Recognize double-letter words in text
Adjectives : Recognize adjectives as words that describe
